about_the_game:
In a world where privacy is almost nonexistent, John convinces the president of a false flag bomb plot to initiate military action against an organization that supports privacy. But was this his best course of action?

The Thought Police Hotline: Episode 1 is a comedy/ sci-fi visual novel, and is the first in a planned The Thought Police Hotline Season 1.

Gameplay

  • This is a visual novel so there isn't much gameplay.
  • You can click to move the dialogue forward.

content_descriptors.notes:
There's some vulgar language in this. There's also a scene towards the beginning where someone, for comedic purposes, takes off their clothes so their underwear is showing. Then at some point they take their underwear off but there's a black box covering that part of their body. That's as bad as it gets in this as far as I know.

Also there's mention of violence and a sound effect for it, but blood isn't shown.

But yeah the "nudity" label is there cause a guy takes his clothes off down to his underwear since that's shown, then takes that off but that area where the underwear was is covered by a black box, and this is all done for comedic purposes.
